overview: In an imprecise time and country, General Zog, a neo-Nazi, sets up a concentration camp, with the direct help of a lieutenant and a doctor. Girls who live on the farms are kidnapped to continue the plan to create a pure breed. When the missing girls' parents hire a pair of mercenaries, Joe and Cat, to investigate what's going on, there are bullets and explosions everywhere!
tagline: Sadistic Nazis are keeping women prisoners for their bizarre experiments in a prison camp hidden in the jungle.
title: The Last Dog of War
